RULE.TEXT: IF (throttle IS verylow) AND (rpm IS low) THEN load IS decreasing
IF (throttle IS low) AND (rpm IS low) THEN load IS between
IF (throttle IS mid) AND (rpm IS low) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS high) AND (rpm IS low) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS veryhigh) AND (rpm IS low) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS verylow) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS fastdecreasing
IF (throttle IS low) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS decreasing
IF (throttle IS mid) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS high) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS veryhigh) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS fastincreasing
IF (throttle IS verylow) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS fastdecreasing
IF (throttle IS mid) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS between
IF (throttle IS high) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS increasing
IF (throttle IS veryhigh) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS turbo
IF (throttle IS mid) AND (rpm IS mid) THEN load IS between
IF (throttle IS low) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS decreasing
IF (throttle IS veryhigh) AND (rpm IS high) THEN load IS turbo
